START.name: Swamp
START.desc: You are in an unfamiliar area. Everything is damp and covered with strange growth. The trees are unlike any you've seen before.

LOC2.name: location 2
LOC2.desc: This swamp is getting thicker and you believe you are hearing voices.

LOC3.name: Location 3
LOC3.desc: This place is getting weirder and weirder. You can barely even see your own hands because of the fog.

LOC4.name: Location 4
LOC4.desc: This place seems almost familiar. You feel as if you've seen the same mossy rock ten times now.

LOC5.name: Location 5
LOC5.desc: You have been stabbed my a small green man 47 times. He keeps screaming something about Dagobah and the Jedi order.
